title: Experiment
description: This element describes the experiment during which this Image was acquired. The optional Description element may contain free text to further describe the experiment.

subCategoriesOrder.Experiment: This element describes the experiment during which this Image was acquired. The optional Description element may contain free text to further describe the experiment.
subCategoriesOrder.Experimenter: This empty element refers to Experimenter that performed this experiment.

Name.description: A user assigned name for this Experiment.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this Experiment.

Purpose.description: This field records a term used the general purpose of the imaging experiment performed in this case.

LabellingMethod.description: This field records a term that describes the method used for the Labelling or Visualization of the structures (i.e. molecular components) under study in this Experiment. The use of a sub-class of the 'Visualization Method' (http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/FBbi_00000031) term from the Biological Imaging Methods Ontology (FBbi; https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/fbbi) is recommended.

LabellingMethodTermAccession.description: This field records the Accession ID for the term used to describe the Visualization Method (also often referred to as Labelling Method). The use of a sub-classes of 'Visualization Method' (http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/FBbi_00000031) from the Biological Imaging Methods Ontology (FBbi; https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/fbbi) is recommended.

Tag.description: This field describes small molecules, peptides or full proteins that were used as label in this Experiment. The use of a sub-class of the 'Tag' (http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/MI_0507) term from the Molecular Interactions Controlled Vocabulary (MI; http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/mi.owl) is recommended.

TagTermAccession.description: This records the Accession ID for the term used to describe the Tag used in this Experiment. The use of a sub-class of http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/MI_0507 is recommended.

HystochemistryType.description: This field records a term that describes the general category of Histochemistry staining used in this case.

items.description: This empty element refers to Experimenter that performed this experiment.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is an empty element that refers to an Annotation (typically a Comment Annotation that consists of a simple multi-line comment) describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
